snippet: At least three people died and thousands were left homeless after several fast-moving fires swept through a crowded slum at the edge of Cape Town on Tuesday.
abstract: At least three people die and thousands are left homeless after several fast-moving fires sweep through crowded slum at edge of Cape Town, South Africa.
lead_paragraph: At least three people died and thousands were left homeless after several fast-moving fires swept through a crowded slum at the edge of Cape Town on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Fires Rip Through Cape Town Slum
headline.main: South Africa: Fires Rip Through Cape Town Slum
headline.print_headline: South Africa: Fires Rip Through Cape Town Slum
